derivation: a primitive root; (also  denominatively from H1098 (בְּלִיל)) to fodder
outline:
1. to mix, mingle, confuse, confound
    1. (Qal)
      1. to mingle, confuse
      2. to mix
      3. to give provender, feed (animals)
    2. (Hithpoel) to mix oneself (among others)
    3. (Hiphil) to fade away
kjv_def: anoint, confound, [idiom] fade, mingle, mix (self), give provender, temper.
strongs_def: to overflow (specifically with oil.); by implication, to mix; to fodder
